text: Hey there! Just joined, working on a HubSpot connector to our product!

~I've deleted a module from a module group in a page template (using the flexible template editor, whatever that mode is called), but I can't figure out how to add it back...~

~Neither Flexible Column mode nor "static" Module group mode works~

~I assume this is a drag and drop thing, but that doesn't work for me. How do I add a module to a module group or flexible column ?~

Answer: "Add" from the right panel
Followup: What happens when there are two modules with th same name??
